text: Seleucus III Ceraunus was the son of Seleucus II Callinicus and the fifth king of the Seleucid Empire. ==Reign== After becoming king, Seleucus III went to war against Attalus I in Asia Minor and two years later Seleucus was assassinated. His brother Antiochus the Great became the new king. Category:Seleucid kings
title: Seleucus III Ceraunus
